edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface ActionInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action, AttackAction, CraftAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.DropItemAction, EatingAction, FertiliseAction, HarvestAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.PickUpItemAction, PlayerDropItemAction, PlayerPickUpItemAction, QuitGameAction, RifleAttackAction, RoarAction, ShotgunAction, SowingAction

    public interface ActionInterface
    This interface provides the ability to add methods to Action, without modifying code in the engine, or downcasting references in the game.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default int getHitpoint()
      get the hit point of the actor itself who has this action
      default edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions getNextActions(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      called inside Player's playturn method, generate submenu after the main menu
      default edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions getSecondNextActions(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction)
      called inside Player's playturn method, generate second round submenu after the the first round submenu
      default edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor getTarget()
      get the target that the actor is aiming at
      default int getwaitTurn()
      get how long this actor has been waited to aim the target

    • Method Detail

      • getNextActions

        default edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions getNextActions(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
        called inside Player's playturn method, generate submenu after the main menu
        Parameters:
        map - the current game map
        Returns:
        the actions displayed in the submenu for the first round in the current turn

      • getSecondNextActions

        default edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions getSecondNextActions(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map,
                                                               edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor actor,
                                                               edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction)
        called inside Player's playturn method, generate second round submenu after the the first round submenu
        Parameters:
        map - the current gamemap
        actor - an actor who called this method
        lastAction - the last action that the actor took
        Returns:
        the actions displayed in the submenu of the second round in the current turn

      • getwaitTurn

        default int getwaitTurn()
        get how long this actor has been waited to aim the target
        Returns:
        the turn that this actor has been waited to aim the target.

      • getTarget

        default edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor getTarget()
        get the target that the actor is aiming at
        Returns:
        the target that the actor is aiming at

      • getHitpoint

        default int getHitpoint()
        get the hit point of the actor itself who has this action
        Returns:
        the hit point of the actor itself who has this action;
